title: Human Bots

embed.description: Unlimited space to host images, easy to use image uploader, albums, photo hosting, sharing, dynamic image resizing on web and mobile.

body: So, this literally was, me (the human) and 4 bots (some person running a program that allows them to level four accounts at once) on my side, and 5 bots on the other side. Is this actually allowed? I just wanted my first win...

replies.body: It's definitely not allowed, make sure to report them under cheating and maybe even intentionally feeding at the end of the game. Your reports help us catch bots and other negative behaviours faster so make sure you remember to report if you come across anything fishy.
Is it true that reports are only noticed if more than 3 people do it? How can we if we are the only ones in a game full of bots? It's so frustrating!
Only one report is needed to trigger an investigation of the actions of that account.

> [{quoted}](name=Vita,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=G8VMUktw,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-02-21T00:35:00.227+0000)
>
> Is it true that reports are only noticed if more than 3 people do it? How can we if we are the only ones in a game full of bots? It's so frustrating!

Because the bots don't just play one game. They are scripted to play 24/7 until level 30 is achieved. People in the following games will also report them (unless they cbf, don't know how, or have the mindset of "riot aren't doing anything so i wont bother reporting them and just come to complain on the boards"), and the reports will stack quickly. 

**You gotta report them if you want something done**
I do, each and every time. I just hope others do too.

I'd also like to ask something about reporting history.  I seem to recall it being said that the system recognises if someone is reporting excessively and it somehow lessens the effectiveness of their reports.  So if someone reports 10 bots in 3 games does this impact their ability to effectively report someone in their next ranked or normal game?  Or take it further, 60 bots reported in one week, does that make a difference?  Because I just made 4 reports in one 20min game. I'd like to know.

You can read more about our Player Behaviour systems here - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/Y9YJ60Fn-player-behaviour-faq

> What about false reports?
> 
> When analysing reports, our systems look for behaviour patterns. Only consistent reports from reliable players will be enough to trigger a punishment. Players who attempt to abuse the system with false reports are flagged and their reports are ignored.

It doesnt matter if you report excessively if they are all accurate. Just make sure they are a bot and not a new player before you report.
That's reassuring, thank you for the quick answer.
what about punishing players who dont want to be stuck in these games

Dear Riot,

Considering that I just finished a co-op game with 4 human bots on my team, I don't think you're doing enough.  Clearly reporting them is a reactive measure, and its not stopping these botting people from ruining a large portion of games for the actual people trying to learn how to play the game.  Even if everyone single person reported a bot, of which there must be hundreds, it would still be 2 or 3 games before anything would actually happen, maybe even more.  Can you honestly say that you think that is acceptable?

I think its time you put your thinking hat on and came up with a method that actually hinders these people from continuing this special brand of cheating.  I'm sure its nice having your queue numbers padded with all the extra games, and I know it only effects pre level 30 players for the most part but its getting really frustrating.

And... it appears again with other accounts.
[](https://imageshack.com/i/pot2ySrtp)

Maybe Riot should just ban that IP address altogether?

Had them aswell in intermediate
They don't communicate, goes to your lane, goes to everyones lanes then feeds, ks you etc
Good thing I was using yasuo(I died 7 times tho lol)

I am with you here. I am so tired of this in Co-op games. I'm constantly getting 2 or 3 bots in every game. It's not fair to new players and certainly not fair when they are feeding and causing the game to draw out.

It sucks because if you were to leave as a real player, you would be punished, not the bots.
